Sentencas: The greatest challenge to improve SOCF (Solid Oxide Fuel Cell) development is to decrease polarization and ohmic concentration resistances mainly for the cathode.
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell

Sentencas: One effective alternative is the introduction of a functional cathode layer between the electrolyte and the conventional cathode.
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell

Sentencas: This functional cathode layer is a composite constituted by the electrolyte and cathode materials, in this case, yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and lanthanum doped strontium (LSM).
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell

Sentencas: This layer improves the contact between the cathode and the electrolyte decreasing the ohmic concentration polarization due to the increasing of triple contact points (TPB) in the bulk concentration.
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell

Sentencas: In this work, two half cells were prepared: the first one is constituted by a functional cathode film (50% in weight), and a collecting current layer (LSM) both deposited on a YSZ pellet.
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell

Sentencas: The second half cell is composed by a LSM cathode layer deposited on the YSZ Tosoh pellet.
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell

Sentencas: The electric study has been realized by Impedance Spectroscopy varying the temperature from 700 to 900 degrees C.
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell

Sentencas: The two half cells resistance decreased with increasing the temperature, and it has noted that the half cell with the functional cathode layer presented the lowest resistance.
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell

Sentencas: After annealing at 750 degrees C for 3 days, the sample without the functional cathode layer presented additional half circles in IS diagrams characterized as resistances due to the bad electrolyte/ electrode adherence.
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell

Sentencas: This phenomenon has been confirmed by Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: The importance of the functional layer in SOFC half cathodic cell
